sentences.en: A sulphurous smell came from the laboratory.
sentences.cn: 实验室传来了硫磺气味.

sentences.en: Again the blue - white scar jagged above them and the sulphurous explosion beat down.
sentences.cn: 他们头上又裂开了一道蓝白色锯子状的口子,带着硫磺味的霹雳声又猛地打将下来.

sentences.en: Scattered remains of fireworks lay ignored and disappointed , emitting their last warm, sulphurous breath.
sentences.cn: 爆裂了的鞭炮的残骸凌乱地躺在街心, 发散它们的最后的热气.

trans.tran_cn: 弥漫着硫黄味的，含有硫黄的
trans.tran_en: related to, full of, or used with sulphur
